subject: Re: [junit] jwebunit
msgSnippet: ... Really? Is it at XPath /html/head/title? -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com Author, JUnit Recipes:
messageBody:
dominodv wrote:
> Hello All, I am attempting to write a simple testscripts that
> connects to a sample application within BEA Weblogic "Avitek
> Medical". I am running into problems with assertTitleEquals, I have
> also had other problems with assertLinkPresentWithText() they seems
> to work sometimes. The error I receive is as follows
>
> There was 1 failure:
> 1) testStartPage(Meditek)junit.framework.ComparisonFailure:
> expected:<... A WebLogic Server Sample ...> but was:<......>
>
> The name title that I am trying to get does exist.

Really? Is it at XPath /html/head/title?
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
